Dune::RefinementImp::HCube::RefinementImp

Dune::RefinementImp::HCube::RefinementImp< dimension_, CoordType > Class Template Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<int dimension_, class CoordType>
class Dune::RefinementImp::HCube::RefinementImp< dimension_, CoordType >

Refinement implementation for hypercubes

Parameters:
dimension_ Dimension of the refined hypercube
CoordType Coordinate type of the refined hypercube
We use RefinementGrid as backend to do all the work.

The interface is the same as for Dune::Refinement (apart from the template parameters).
